title: MUSIAL
description: Storage of genomic features (genes, chromosoems), their nucleotide variants and induced amino acid mutations wrt. a set of samples.

parameters.description: Parameters used to infer nucleotide variants, i.e. all stored variants comply with the parameters in at least one sample.

minCoverage.description: The minimal depth of coverage wrt. reads of a variant to be accepted.

minFrequency.description: The minimal frequency wrt. reads supporting a homozygous allele call for a variant to be accepted.

minHetFrequency.description: The minimal frequency wrt. reads supporting a heterozygous allele call for a variant to be accepted.

maxHetFrequency.description: The maximal frequency wrt. reads supporting a heterozygous allele call for a variant to be accepted.

minQuality.description: The minimal call quality for a variant to be accepted.

features.description: Stores pattern properties associated with a single (coding gene) feature. The key of each feature defines the internal gene name and stores an object.

^.+$.description: Information about a single genomic feature stored as `object`.

name.description: The internal feature name; has to be equal to the key at which this object is stored.

nucleotideSequence.description: The nucleotide sequence of the feature.

translatedNucleotideSequence.description: The translated nucleotide sequence of the feature.

proteinSequences.description: The actual aminoacid sequences of a (optionally) provided structure. Sequences are stored per chain.

^.+$.description: The aminoacid sequence of a protein structure chain. Lower case symbols imply that the subsequences were not part of the translated nucleotide sequence.

structure.description: File content of a `pdb` format file of the allocated proteins structure.

chromosome.description: The name of the locus this feature is located on.

start.description: The 1-based start position of the (coding gene) feature on its locus

end.description: The 1-based end position of the (gene) feature on its locus

isSense.description: Whether the feature is encoded on the sense or antisense strand.

isCodingSequence.description: Whether the feature is a coding sequence.

alleles.description: Grouping of a set of samples into a common allele, i.e., all samples share the same nucleotide variants wrt. this feature.

^.+$.description: Information about a single allele of the feature.

name.description: The internal name of the allele. AL00000000WT reflects the reference proteoform.

NO_DEL.description: The number of recorded deletions of this allele.

VARIANTS.description: String representation of all variants recorded for this allele.

FRQ.description: The frequency of this allele wrt. all samples.

NO_SUB.description: The number of recorded substitutions of this allele.

VAR_POS.description: The percentage of variable positions of this allele wrt. the reference feature length.

NO_INS.description: The number of recorded insertions of this allele.

samples.description: List of all samples that yield this allele.

proteoforms.description: Grouping of a set of samples into a common proteoform, i.e., all samples share the same induced aminoacid variants wrt. this feature.

^.+$.description: Information about a single proteoform of the feature.

name.description: The internal name of the proteoform. PF00000000WT reflects the reference proteoform.

DIV_TERM_POS.description: The first novel termination codon or N/A if none is present.

DIV_TERM_TRC_PRC.description: The percentage of positions truncated by the first novel termination codon or N/A if none is present.

NO_DEL.description: The number of recorded deletions of this proteoform.

VARIANTS.description: String representation of all variants recorded for this proteoform.

FRQ.description: The frequency of this proteoform wrt. all samples.

NO_SUB.description: The number of recorded substitutions of this proteoform.

VAR_POS.description: The percentage of variable positions of this proteoform wrt. the reference feature length.

NO_INS.description: The number of recorded insertions of this proteoform.

samples.description: List of all samples that yield this proteoform.

annotations.description: Any additional string annotations of this feature.

aminoacidVariants.description: Information about aminoacid variants stored in a nested object structure.

^[0-9]+\\+[0-9]+$.description: The position of the variant on the parent locus.

^[ARNDCEQGHILKMFPSTWYVX*-]+$.description: The alternate aminoacid symbol of the variant. May include `-` for gaps.

annotations.description: String annotations of the aminoacid variant.

FRQ.description: The frequency of this aminoacid variant wrt. all samples.

occurrence.description: A list of all proteoforms yielding this variant.

^.+$.description: Information about a single sample stored as `object`.

name.description: The internal sample name; has to be equal to the key at which this object is stored.

annotations.description: Any `string` type key/value pairs yielding meta-information about the sample.

^AL\\![a-zA-Z0-9-_]+$.description: Assignment of this sample to a feature's allele.

^PF\\![a-zA-Z0-9-_]+$.description: Assignment of this sample to a feature's proteoform.

software.description: The software with which the variants dictionary was computed.

date.description: The date at which the variants dictionary was computed.

nucleotideVariants.description: Information about nucleotide variants stored in a nested object structure.

^[ACGTN-]+$.description: The alternate nucleotide sequence of the variant. May include `-` for gaps and stores the content of the `position` inclusively.

annotations.description: Any `string` type key/value pairs yielding meta-information about the variant.

LOC.description: The chromosome/locus this variant is located on.

FRQ.description: The frequency this variant wrt. all samples.

REF_CONT.description: The reference sequence content of this variant.

PRIMARY.description: Whether the variant is primary or not, i.e., it has the highest frequency among all variants at the exact same position within one single sample.

occurrence.description: Yields key/value pairs indicating the occurence of this variant in a specific feature's allele.

excludedPositions.description: Any positions that were excluded from the analysis.

^.+$.description: List of positions that were excluded from the analysis. The pattern property key should match any reference sequence identifier.
